=callback.properties=
Please place this file in your assets folder of your app after configuring callback and cancel urls. Normally callback and cancel urls
of facebook and twitter will remain same.You can enter your own callback and cancel urls for linkedin and myspace.

{{{
#twitter
twitter.callback_url = twitterapp://connect
twitter.cancel_url = twitterapp://connect?denied

#facebook
facebook.callback_url =	fbconnect://success
facebook.cancel_url = fbconnect://cancel

#LinkedIn
linkedin.callback_url = http://opensource.brickred.com/socialauthdemo/socialAuthSuccessAction.do
linkedin.cancel_url = http://brickred.com/socialauthdemo

#MySpace
myspace.callback_url = http://opensource.brickred.com
myspace.cancel_url = http://opensource.brickred.com/?oauth_problem


}}}
